item.title: EP 88 - Imbunche: Do You Know Where Your Children Are?
item.itunes:title: Imbunche: Do You Know Where Your Children Are?
item.description:
Today we don't eat our Wheaties, and then we attend the trial of warlocks in Chile.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

The Iraqi Grain Disaster is one of the biggest mass poisoning in world history. When mercury coated, drought resistant seeds are shipped over to Iraq from Mexico, nobody thought there would be a problem. But there was one: the warning labels were in Spanish.

Then we go on the hunt for the Imbunche. Is this disfigured human turned into a warlock's bodyguard just a legend? And if so, why were 100 warlocks arrested in the same area the Imbunches were known to roam?

Links:

Deadly Crush

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zFuujfB394c

A Nuclear Warning Designed to Last 10,000 Years

https://hyperallergic.com/312318/a-nuclear-warning-designed-to-last-10000-years/

Iraq Mercury Poisoning – August 1971

https://devastatingdisasters.com/iraq-mercury-poisoning-august-1971/

Iraq Mercury Poisoning

https://corrosion-doctors.org/Elements-Toxic/Mercury-Iraq-1.htm

1971 Iraq poison grain disaster

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1971_Iraq_poison_grain_disaster

Imbunche

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imbunche

The Terrifying Legend of El Imbunche

http://ancients-bg.com/the-terrifying-legend-of-el-imbunche/

Into the Cave of Chile’s Witches

https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/into-the-cave-of-chiles-witches-20138093/

The strange legend of El Imbunche – Chile

https://coolinterestingstuff.com/the-strange-legend-of-el-imbunche-chile

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
